effect.scarlet_violet: User pays half its max HP to raise its Attack to +6 stages. If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.
effect.the_teal_mask: User pays half its max HP to raise its Attack to +6 stages. If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.
effect.the_indigo_disk: User pays half its max HP to raise its Attack to +6 stages. If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.
effect.legends_za: User pays half its max HP to raise its Attack to +6 stages. If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.
effect.mega_dimension: User pays half its max HP to raise its Attack to +6 stages. If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: User pays half its max HP to max out its Attack.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: User pays half its max HP to max out its Attack.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: User pays half its max HP to max out its Attack.
short_effect.legends_za: User pays half its max HP to max out its Attack.
short_effect.mega_dimension: User pays half its max HP to max out its Attack.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user maximizes its Attack stat but loses HP equal to half its max HP.
